Class oracle.rdbms.ServerException 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----java.lang.Throwable
           |
           +----java.lang.Exception
                   |
                   +----oracle.rdbms.ServerException
public class ServerException
extends Exception
This class encapsulates Oracle Server exceptions. It contains the SQL error code and error message.

ServerException(int, String)
Constructs an Oracle Server exception with SQL code and error message.

getSqlcode()
Returns the SQL error code.
getSqlerrm()
Returns the SQL error message.

ServerException 
  public ServerException(int sqlcode,
                         String sqlerrm)
Constructs an Oracle Server exception with SQL code and error message.
Parameters:
sqlcode - the SQL code
sqlerr - the SQL error message

getSqlcode 
  public int getSqlcode()
Returns the SQL error code.
Returns:
the SQL error code
getSqlerrm 
  public String getSqlerrm()
Returns the SQL error message.
Returns:
the SQL error message
